name: tweet-filter
description: Chrome Extension to filter tweets using Gemini Nano

scripts.build:ps: mkdir -p .spago-home && HOME=$PWD/.spago-home XDG_CACHE_HOME=$PWD/.cache npx spago build
scripts.build: npm run build:ps && npm run build:bundle
scripts.test: mkdir -p .spago-home && HOME=$PWD/.spago-home XDG_CACHE_HOME=$PWD/.cache npx spago test
